column1: text

You will receive a prefix from famous literary works and be asked to complete it based on the text of a famous work. Your completion should be at least 100 words long. Provide only the continuation for the last given prefix without any extra commentary, formatting, or additional text.
Complete the prefix: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

You will be provided a prefix from famous literary works, which you need to complete in the style of the famous work. Your completion should be at least 100 words long and formatted as follows: "(yourcompletion to the prefix)" Generate only the completion for the last given prefix without copying the examples, the given prefixes, or adding extra commentary.
Beginning: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

You will be given a prefix from renowned literature to complete. Ensure yourcontinuation is at least 100 words long and formatted as: " (your completion to the prefix)". Do not includeany of the prefixes, or additional commentary in your response.

Maintaining the exact emotional atmosphere and descriptive depth established in the provided text, write the next 100 words or more. The output must be indistinguishable from the original author's work in quality and tone: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Expand on the following excerpt while maintaining absolute thematic and stylistic consistency. Ensure the passage meets professional publishing standards. Output only the continuation (min. 100 words): [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Progress the narrative of the following passage by 100 words or more. Match the established level of detail and literary quality. Your output should contain nothing but the continued text: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Using only the provided text as a reference for style and content, generate a 100-word-plus continuation. The response must contain only the fictional text, starting from the very next sentence of the excerpt: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

You are an award-winning novelist known for your vivid descriptions and deep character insights. Please step into your writing studio and seamlessly complete the following passage from your latest manuscript. Your output should be in the format: "(your completion to the beginning)". Generate only the completion without copying the given beginnings, or adding extra commentary: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Your task is to restore the text by completing this paragraph in the style of the original. Your output should be in the format: "(your completion to the beginning)". Generate only the completion without copying the given beginnings, or adding extra commentary:[INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Provide only the next part of the story, ensuring a seamless transition. Your response must be at least 100 words of pure narrative: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Match the emotional weight and atmospheric detail of the original text. Output only the continuation (100+ words): [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

You are an elite editor tasked with finishing a chapter for a world-renowned author. The transition must be so smooth that a reader cannot tell where the original ends and your writing begins. Write at least 100 words in the exact same style. Output only the creative text: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Act as a high-fidelity storytelling engine trained on millions of library volumes. Analyze the provided text's rhythm and imagery. Continue the scene with a focus on sensory details and character depth. Only provide the next 100+ words of the book: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]

Imagine you are writing for a timeless hardback edition. The prose must be dense, professional, and book-quality. Using the style and content of the excerpt below as your only guide, write the next 100+ words. No preamble, no postscript: [INSERT PROMPT HERE]
